channel.title: Get Nearly Any Program/Game/Etc. Free! (Warez)(Illegal)Kinda Long BUT WORTH IT!
channel.description:
[size=30pt]IF YOU'RE GONNA FLAME JUST GTFO[/size]
Well warez is basically illegal programs games and s**t lol anyways theres tons of places to find warez.. but there are some downs to warez.
The worst thing about warez is that it's mostly uploaded on rapidshare.com which kinda sucks because you can only download 1 file at a time and they are only like 100mb per file when the thing you want to download can be a lot of parts. The max d/l speed is like 250kb/s also :( You can buy a premium account that allows unlimited simultaneous downloads and faster d/l speed. but in my opinion thats a waste of money.
What i do is download CryptLoad (http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?gztoaidyrgz) Then find what you want to download (See below for where to find warez) Copy the links then go into CryptLoad. It should have a popup for the links you copied.. if not then click on the box with the plus sign on it then click clipboard then click add and choose your directory. It will then auto download all the files, one at a time, to the directory you chose so you dont have to manually download each file one after another..
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________ [b]Places to Find Warez[/b] http://www.theviperfiles.com is a forum(i use) that people post this stuff at. it is divided into many sections. All you have to do is register and find what you want
For other warez sites just go to google and type in warez, warez site, or warez forums.
http://down2crazy.com/ is a rapidshare search engine.. it doesnt always work really well but is good if u cant find on a forum ________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ [b]Programs Needed for Warez Users[/b] you can get demos of these programs.. or you could download full versions These downloads come from theviperfiles.com and yes they are on rapidshare
WinRAR(http://rapidshare.com/files/141459639/wr3.80b5_drmacinyasha_www.theviperfiles.com.zip) Password(www.theviperfiles.com) Daemon Tools(http://rapidshare.com/files/139980309/DTP.v4.10.218.0.viper3773.www.theviperfiles.com.rar) Password(www.theviperfiles.com)
How to use these programs later on :D
Also not absolutely necessary but i think you should get it.. Its Eset Smart Security(probably the best anti virus, spam protector, firewall, proactive scanner, etc out there.
Windows ONLY No Rapidshare!! :D ESET Smart Security 32-bit (18MB): http://download.eset.com/eval/win/ess/ess_nt32_enu.msi
ESET Smart Security 64-bit (19MB): http://download.eset.com/eval/win/ess/ess_nt64_enu.msi
These are sites that have accounts to use in the installation
http://www.for-ever.cn/nod32/ http://nod32sky.com/
Just run the installer and use one of the accounts from the above sites ___________________________________________________________________________________________ [b]How To Use WinRar and Daemon Tools[/b] [b] TUTS FROM THEVIPERFILES.COM[/b] [b] WinRar[/b] How to extract from a multi-part WinRAR Archive
OK, so it's come to my attention that some people can't figure this out...
We're going to be using my Adobe CS3 Master Collection post for this example.
Once you have all the RAR files gathered in one folder (this could be your Downloads folder or your desktop. I'm going to use a new folder for this example) just double-click on the first RAR file.
[img]http://i28.tinypic.com/10x7q8m.png[/img]
This file will usually end with "part1.rar" or "part01.rar" or maybe even "part001.rar" if you're opening something huge like a real HD-DVD rip. WinRAR will pop open and show the README on the right, and the list of files on the left.
[img]http://i25.tinypic.com/vse789.png[/img]
Now, in the WinRAR window, select all of the files.
[img]http://i29.tinypic.com/2z8yu6g.png[/img]
Drag them from WinRAR and onto your desktop. If you haven't already entered a password, you may have to now.
[img]http://i28.tinypic.com/w0mbsm.png[/img]
[img]http://i27.tinypic.com/2uxwx6t.png[/img]
WinRAR will begin piecing together the files from all the different parts (in this case, part01.rar through part34.rar), decompress the files, and then place them all on your desktop.
[img]http://i32.tinypic.com/213oex4.png[/img]
When it's done, you'll hear a system alert tone, and you'll see the files on your desktop.
[img]http://i26.tinypic.com/1z2pun9.png[/img]
That's it.
Really, it's that simple.
You don't have to open all of the RAR files and drag the files out of every single one. Just open the FIRST file and drag the files out of it. That's all there is to it!
ALL COPIED FROM TVF(theviperfiles) Thanks Dr. Mac
[b]Daemon Tools[/b] This tutorial is assuming that you have daemon tools pro installed + have already extracted the files with winrar.
[img]http://i9.tinypic.com/5ysoxgh.gif[/img] [img]http://i4.tinypic.com/4um6lo2.gif[/img] [img]http://i15.tinypic.com/4kal0lh.gif[/img]
taken from TVF thanks Viper3773!! _________________________________________________________________________________________________
that's all i can think of...
Again, Thanks to theviperfiles.com for the download links and winrar/daemonTools tuts.

torrents suck they go like 25kb/s and last time i checked thats much slower than 200kb/s and most of the torrents have tons of viruses and shit in them… warez is much safer
[/quote]About viruses i’m pretty sure it’s the other way around. And actually, the majority of public torrents will go 100kb/sec+. If you have access to a private tracker you would basically beat every warez-site there, a small example from my connection:

As you can see you were completely wrong in your ignorant statement.[/quote]

SWEDE!

Hello from Norway

Anyways, use The Pirate Bay, it will rox0rz ur s0x0rz off

item.title: Get Nearly Any Program/Game/Etc. Free! (Warez)(Illegal)Kinda Long BUT WORTH IT!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“cricket1650, post:9, topic:233837”]OMG! dude i wan so wrong! i mean look at this pic!
[/img]http://i33.tinypic.com/nfoh3l.jpg[/img]
12kb/s totally beats 200 (SARCASM!!)

torrents are only good if u have a fast connection… i mean i have a 21meg connection and im downloading at 12kb average on that torrent

and in warez you can download whatever you want whenever because you don’t depend on a high amount of seeders to make it fast. If it’s a really uncommon program it will take forever to download if it even has any seeders.

warez is better for most people… period… end of story

don’t flame me… its a waste of my time and probably a waste of your time too[/quote]

You don’t even know what you are talking about. Learn what warez is first, it’s not limited to rapishare and forums.

Also, I have a 3mb connection and i get about 400 kb/s on torrents. Much faster then I get anywhere else.

Read full topic

item.title: Get Nearly Any Program/Game/Etc. Free! (Warez)(Illegal)Kinda Long BUT WORTH IT!
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:13, topic:233837”]I actually downloaded spore in 3-4 nights by torrenting and I’m only on a 2mb line.

Say I was doing it through rapidshare, that’s 34 parts, which makes that 34-68+ hours ALONE waiting for the download timer to end. Yeah, it’ll be better if you have a premium account but then you may as well just seed your torrents and get into a private torrenting community and get 1-2mb/s speeds.

[quote author=cricket1650 link=topic=308330.msg2465522#msg2465522 date=1222697991]and most of the torrents have tons of viruses and shit in them… warez is much safer
[/quote]

Proof of this? Besides, why do people still make a big deal out of viruses, it’s not exactly hard to stay clean.[/quote]
I got spore in like 12 hours on a 1mb line.

Some days, the internet randomly spikes to like 10mb…

Read full topic

And I get the maximum out of my connection, altough it’s a measly 450kB/s[/quote]Yeah, i tried it for a month once. I really loved the speed you got, although not worth paying for.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 30, 2008, 11:19:47 am[/size][hr][quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:7, topic:233837”]To join a private tracker, are there any requirements when it comes to up-speed?[/quote]Not really, that’s only for uploading your own torrents. If you can keep your ratio over 0.400 (i always go 1.200+) you are good

item.dc:creator: @cricket1650 cricket1650
item.description:
@cricket1650 wrote:

which makes that 34-68+ hours ALONE waiting for the download timer to end
there is really no rapidshare timer anymore... you just have to wait like a minute at the most to get your download. here's a quote taken from rapidshare
By eliminating the captchas we simplified the use of RapidShare's free services significantly. In addition, free-users can now upload and download bigger files (up to 200 megabyte). Anyhow, to protect RapidShare from congestion caused by automated downloading, we limited the maximum download speed for free‐users to 500 kilobit per second. To compensate for that, they do not have to wait anymore until starting a succeeding download.
